author: Staff Reporter
text:
V. Gopakumar (49) of Perunthoor in Amaravilai allegedly committed suicide by hanging inside a private cashew processing unit at Varavari near Nithiravailai in Kanyakumari district on Sunday night.

Debts

He was a supervisor in the unit and had debts.

On a complaint lodged by T. Jayan, manager of the unit, Nithiravilai police registered a case of unnatural death. The body was sent to Kuzhithurai Government Hospital.
title: Supervisor commits suicide
